## Description {#details}

A vector constant whose element type is a simple 1/2/4/8-byte integer or float/double, and whose elements are just simple data values (i.e.

ConstantInt/ConstantFP). This <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> node has no operands because it stores all of the elements of the constant as densely packed data, instead of as Value&#42;&#39;s.

Definition at line 770 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h">Constants.h</a>.

Otherwise return NULL.

### getFP() {#acc193957138fece590fe07417912f018}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; ConstantDataVector::getFP (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; ElementType, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint16&#95;t &gt; Elts)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
<a href="#acc193957138fece590fe07417912f018">getFP()</a> constructors - Return a constant of vector type with a float element type taken from argument ‘ElementType`, and count taken from / argument ‘Elts`.

The amount of bits of the contained type must match the number of bits of the type contained in the passed in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>. (i.e. half or bfloat for 16bits, float for 32bits, double for 64bits) Note that this can return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantaggregatezero">ConstantAggregateZero</a> object.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h/#l00812">812</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h">Constants.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/constants-cpp/#l03044">3044</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/constants-cpp">Constants.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getRaw() {#a074d013c7183283d9aaa8d7127057242}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Constant &#42; llvm::ConstantDataVector::getRaw (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Data, uint64&#95;t NumElements, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; ElementTy)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
<a href="#a074d013c7183283d9aaa8d7127057242">getRaw()</a> constructor - Return a constant with vector type with an element count and element type matching the NumElements and ElementTy parameters passed in.

Note that this can return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantaggregatezero">ConstantAggregateZero</a> object. ElementTy must be one of i8/i16/i32/i64/half/bfloat/float/double. Data is the buffer containing the elements. Be careful to make sure Data uses the right endianness, the buffer will be used as-is.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h/#l00800">800</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h">Constants.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getSplat() {#a44124e702dc442346bd6202bb03e593b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; ConstantDataVector::getSplat (unsigned NumElts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; Elt)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantvector">ConstantVector</a> with the specified constant in each element.

The specified constant has to be a of a compatible type (i8/i16/ i32/i64/half/bfloat/float/double) and must be a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantfp">ConstantFP</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h/#l00819">819</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h">Constants.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/constants-cpp/#l03068">3068</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/constants-cpp">Constants.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
